page.title: 02Where I live (Cheshunt)
page.content: I live in a semi_detached,three bedroomed house in Goffs Oak.The house is situated on Cuffley Hill which is a fairly busy road,but because we live in a service road,the traffic does not bother us much.The recent building of the M25 has cut down the number of lorries along Cuffley Hill.Goffs Oak is a village in the countryside of Hertfordshire.It has two primary schools,a library,and a recently built doctor's surgery.There are also two churches,local shops,tennis courts,and a garage.There are also several farms and nurseries in the village.Near the shops is a war memorial which reminds us of the people who were killed in the war. Although Goffs Oak is a country village,it can be reached by a fast train from Cuffley,a neighbouring village.
